main event: Mrs. Evelyn Becker and her neighbor observed a single bright light moving rapidly in the sky in Clarkson, Michigan on 6 November 1959.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 7:00 PM,The light was visible for about 1-2 minutes,The light traveled from north to southeast,No other details were reported,The Air Force found no explanation for the sighting.
sighted object: a single bright light in the sky
witness description: Mrs. Evelyn Becker and her neighbor, Mrs. Mary Smith
